title: Hailee Steinfeld looks like a boss in a pinstriped suit with colorblock lapels
text:
She's the star of the new Apple TV series Dickinson.

And Hailee Steinfeld came out to push the finished product in style as she left a press junket for the show in New York City on Sunday.

The 22-year-old actress looked pulled-together in a navy blue suit with pinstripes and colorblock lapels.

Chic: She's the star of the new Apple TV series Dickinson. And Hailee Steinfeld came out to push the finished product in style as she left a press junket for the show in New York City on Sunday

She paired the look with white pointed-toe boots and allowed her long brunette locks to cascade down her back.

Steinfeld kept her makeup minimal with a swipe of brown shadow with metallic flecks and a berry-toned lip pigment.

Dickinson 'audaciously explores the constraints of society, gender and family from the perspective of rebellious young poet Emily Dickinson,' according to an official Apple synopsis.

Posh: The 22-year-old actress looked pulled-together in a navy blue suit with pinstripes and colorblock lapels

Although the show's title character is an 1850s poet, Steinfeld believes that young girls will be able to learn from her experiences.

'I hope that they don’t feel like they have to be okay with being unseen, because that’s not okay. You should want to feel understood and good about who you are and what you do and what makes you happy,' she said to Variety.

Steinfeld continued: 'I’m so excited that I was given the opportunity to embody this character.

Stylish: She paired the look with white pointed-toe boots and allowed her long brunette locks to cascade down her back

'I mean, I could have used this a couple of years ago, but I can use every bit of it in my life right now.

'And I can only hope that other young girls see the show and feel fearless and courageous and can embody that sense of Emily Dickinson, as well.'

Dickinson premieres via Apple TV on Nov. 1.
description: She's the star of the new Apple TV series Dickinson. And Hailee Steinfeld came out to push the finished product in style as she left a press junket for the show in New York City on Sunday.
